trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: La classe AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs viene utilizzata per fornire i valori dell'evento per il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>eventi e che consente di specificare un'identità Windows personalizzata per la richiesta corrente.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>evento del <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>classe specificando una subroutine denominata **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Creating>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs a AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>costruisce un oggetto AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs mediante l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e lo passa al **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property of the AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs fornito per il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento per impostare l'identificatore anonimo su un valore personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A> property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>proprietà durante il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento, un <xref:System.Guid>viene utilizzato.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs.AnonymousID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento viene generato solo quando l'identificazione anonima è <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>Costruisce un <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>oggetto utilizzando <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> corrente</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule>

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs> object to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: Passa quindi il <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>dell'oggetto per il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the anonymous identifier for the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'identificatore anonimo per l'utente.

trans-unit.source: You can use the AnonymousID property to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la proprietà AnonymousID per impostare l'identificatore anonimo su un valore personalizzato durante il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the AnonymousID property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a <xref:System.Guid> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per la proprietà AnonymousID durante il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento, un <xref:System.Guid>viene utilizzato.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when the anonymous identification is <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** evento viene generato solo quando l'identificazione anonima è <xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Security.AnonymousIdentificationModule.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The anonymous identifier for the user.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore anonimo per l'utente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> oggetto per la richiesta HTTP corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>fornisce l'accesso a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>oggetti per la richiesta corrente.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> oggetto per la richiesta HTTP corrente.
